title: We had a nice Type Evening in SF - Monday Jan 16th
content:
Sorry for the repeat notice but my old notice is a week old & might be buried.

Type Evening in SF - Tonight - Monday @ 7:00pm

We are meeting at 7pm at Ti Couz (Crepe house) on 16th & Mission

If folks call me to say they are coming @ 617.312.1968 then I will try to reserve a table of the right size.

Cheers!
author: Eben Sorkin

comments.content:
So far I have confirmed:

Shu, Zara, Grant (in town - lucky us and him!), Tamye, Carl, myself
Delve has also confirmed. See you there!
Sorry I can’t make it tonight… Have a great time. Share some pics, please!
I wish I could be there with you, but, alas, I’m in Matsumoto, Japan. Hopefully next time!
Sorry I couldn’t come. It would have been nice to meetup with some phellow ‘philes. I too will look forward to some pics.
It was great to meet you tonight. Thanks for coming out.

Damn! I wish I had known about this… well next time pehaps?! Hope you had fun?

Cheers

Stefan, I think Stewf worked his little heart out to try and contact you (maybe not hard enough) - though it was kind of short notice. You were missed. We’ll meet again soon!

Great seeing & meeting those who did come out - and thanks Eben for the restaurant recommendation, it was great!
It was nice. Glad to see all of you. Eben, thanks to you for providing an occasion and motivating us. I encourage travelers to stir up type chats whenever they travel. Fun for all.

Last night was a fun time. Ti Couz was a good choice and the “Sweet & Low” dessert (see Zara’s or Carl’s pictures) was fab. Next time I’m going to get the cider. It was good see everyone again and to meet you Eben, Grant and Shu for the first time.

Stefan, you were missed. Hopefully I’ll get to see you before you return home and perhaps Rod could be cajoled into coming out to play too. There was talk last night of putting together an east bay typophile gathering sometime soon. Anyone want to suggest a date?
